amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in the bill for defense of any action challenging the Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to defend against any action challenging any provision of Public Law 111-148 or any provision of title I or subtitle B of title II of Public Law 111-152; or any amendment to a provision of law made by any provision described in paragraph (1).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 229 - 194 (Roll no. 228).
